post_title: WonderFox HD Video Converter Factory Pro 9.2 Crack is Here !
post_text:
WonderFox HD Video Converter Factory Pro

It is equipped with advanced High-Definition (HD) video conversion technology. It can help users convert videos from Standard-Definition (SD) to High-Definition (HD) like HD MP4, HD MKV, HD AVI, HD MTS, HD TRP, even 4k standard and also enables users to cut down the video size (convert HD videos to SD videos). This HD conversion software supports the newest encoder H265(HEVC), VP9 and 200+ video formats. It can convert nearly all popular videos to virtually any video format including SD video to HD video, for example, converting Multi-track HD video M2TS, MKV, AVCHD, HDTV BDAV and MPEG-TS and more to a wide range of popular video and audio formats.

Features

  • Rich video effect options: Mosaic, Blur, Sharpen, Emboss, Noise, Old Film, etc.
  • Crop video to remove the black bars. Cut off unwanted area to feature a highlight.
  • Cut part of video clip that you want to get output, save time for the conversion process.
  • Merge multi video clips to one flexibly.

What’s New in v9.2 ?

1. Add the latest pictue enhancement technology(code=wf2.31).

2. Support downloading 1080P, 4K, 8K video from YouTube.

How to Crack ?

1. Install WonderFox HD Video Converter Factory
2. Run WonderFox HD Video Converter Factory Pro Crack
3. Click on Crack button
4. Wait till a message pops & then click on OK
5. That’s all
